summary: AN ORDINANCE, relating to City employment, to be known as the First Quarter 2001 Salary Ordinance, establishing a salary for a new title for the Personnel Department; designating one position to be exempt from civil service, and amending the Seattle Municipal Code (S.M.C.) 4.13.010, Section 17, also known as the Exemptions Ordinance (120166); all by a 2/3 vote of the Council.
